name: Descend (altair.games.llc)
description:
In a world with no lands but water, descend deep into to survive based on what the ocean has to offer.

Controls:

W / A / S / D - Move Forward / Left / Down / Right
SPACE - Jump / Swin Straight update
LEFT ALT - Swim Straight Down
LEFT SHIFT - Sprint / Swim Faster
C - Crouch
E - Interact (Press/Hold) / Toggle Crafting Bench Inventory
TAB - Toggle Inventory
ESC / P - Pause Game
R - Rotate Placeable Items
V - Toggle TP /FP
